display_html:
data Proxy a' a b' b m r
  • = Request a' (a -> Proxy a' a b' b m r)
  • | Respond b (b' -> Proxy a' a b' b m r)
  • | M (m (Proxy a' a b' b m r))
  • | Pure r
name: Proxy Pure M Request Respond

display_html: unsafeHoist :: Functor m => (forall x. m x -> n x) -> Proxy a' a b' b m r -> Proxy a' a b' b n r
name: unsafeHoist

display_html: observe :: Monad m => Proxy a' a b' b m r -> Proxy a' a b' b m r
name: observe

name: X

name: closed

display_html: data Proxy a' a b' b m r
name: Proxy

display_html: runEffect :: Monad m => Effect m r -> m r
name: runEffect

display_html: respond :: Functor m => a -> Proxy x' x a' a m a'
name: respond

display_html: (/>/) :: Functor m => (a -> Proxy x' x b' b m a') -> (b -> Proxy x' x c' c m b') -> a -> Proxy x' x c' c m a'
(//>) :: Functor m => Proxy x' x b' b m a' -> (b -> Proxy x' x c' c m b') -> Proxy x' x c' c m a'
request :: Functor m => a' -> Proxy a' a y' y m a
name: request

display_html: (\>\) :: Functor m => (b' -> Proxy a' a y' y m b) -> (c' -> Proxy b' b y' y m c) -> c' -> Proxy a' a y' y m c
(>\\) :: Functor m => (b' -> Proxy a' a y' y m b) -> Proxy b' b y' y m c -> Proxy a' a y' y m c
push :: Functor m => a -> Proxy a' a a' a m r
name: push

display_html: (>~>) :: Functor m => (_a -> Proxy a' a b' b m r) -> (b -> Proxy b' b c' c m r) -> _a -> Proxy a' a c' c m r
(>>~) :: Functor m => Proxy a' a b' b m r -> (b -> Proxy b' b c' c m r) -> Proxy a' a c' c m r
pull :: Functor m => a' -> Proxy a' a a' a m r
name: pull

display_html: (>+>) :: Functor m => (b' -> Proxy a' a b' b m r) -> (_c' -> Proxy b' b c' c m r) -> _c' -> Proxy a' a c' c m r
(+>>) :: Functor m => (b' -> Proxy a' a b' b m r) -> Proxy b' b c' c m r -> Proxy a' a c' c m r
reflect :: Functor m => Proxy a' a b' b m r -> Proxy b b' a a' m r
name: reflect

display_html: type X = Void
name: X

display_html: type Effect = Proxy X () () X
name: Effect

display_html: type Producer b = Proxy X () () b
name: Producer

display_html: type Pipe a b = Proxy () a () b
name: Pipe

display_html: type Consumer a = Proxy () a () X
name: Consumer

display_html: type Client a' a = Proxy a' a () X
name: Client

display_html: type Server b' b = Proxy X () b' b
name: Server

display_html: type Effect' m r = forall x' x y' y. Proxy x' x y' y m r
name: Effect'

display_html: type Producer' b m r = forall x' x. Proxy x' x () b m r
name: Producer'

display_html: type Consumer' a m r = forall y' y. Proxy () a y' y m r
name: Consumer'

display_html: type Client' a' a m r = forall y' y. Proxy a' a y' y m r
name: Client'

display_html: type Server' b' b m r = forall x' x. Proxy x' x b' b m r
name: Server'

display_html: (\<\) :: Functor m => (b -> Proxy x' x c' c m b') -> (a -> Proxy x' x b' b m a') -> a -> Proxy x' x c' c m a'
(/</) :: Functor m => (c' -> Proxy b' b x' x m c) -> (b' -> Proxy a' a x' x m b) -> c' -> Proxy a' a x' x m c
(<~<) :: Functor m => (b -> Proxy b' b c' c m r) -> (a -> Proxy a' a b' b m r) -> a -> Proxy a' a c' c m r
(~<<) :: Functor m => (b -> Proxy b' b c' c m r) -> Proxy a' a b' b m r -> Proxy a' a c' c m r
(<+<) :: Functor m => (c' -> Proxy b' b c' c m r) -> (b' -> Proxy a' a b' b m r) -> c' -> Proxy a' a c' c m r
(<\\) :: Functor m => (b -> Proxy x' x c' c m b') -> Proxy x' x b' b m a' -> Proxy x' x c' c m a'
(//<) :: Functor m => Proxy b' b y' y m c -> (b' -> Proxy a' a y' y m b) -> Proxy a' a y' y m c
(<<+) :: Functor m => Proxy b' b c' c m r -> (b' -> Proxy a' a b' b m r) -> Proxy a' a c' c m r
closed :: X -> a
name: closed

name: for

(<~) :: Functor m => (b -> Proxy x' x c' c m b') -> (a -> Proxy x' x b' b m a') -> a -> Proxy x' x c' c m a'
type Consumer a = Proxy () a () X

name: Consumer'

(~<) :: Functor m => Proxy () b y' y m c -> Proxy a' a y' y m b -> Proxy a' a y' y m c
type Pipe a b = Proxy () a () b
name: Pipe

name: cat

(<-<) :: Functor m => Proxy () b c' c m r -> Proxy a' a () b m r -> Proxy a' a c' c m r

newtype ListT m a = Select {
  • enumerate :: Producer a m ()
}
name: ListT Select enumerate

name: runListT

class Enumerable t where
  • toListT :: Monad m => t m a -> ListT m a
name: Enumerable toListT

name: every

display_html:
class (Alternative m, Monad m) => MonadPlus (m :: Type -> Type) where
  • mzero :: m a
  • mplus :: m a -> m a -> m a
name: MonadPlus mzero mplus

display_html:
class Monad m => MonadIO (m :: Type -> Type) where
  • liftIO :: IO a -> m a
name: MonadIO liftIO

display_html:
class MonadTrans (t :: (Type -> Type) -> Type -> Type) where
  • lift :: Monad m => m a -> t m a
name: MonadTrans lift

display_html:
class MFunctor (t :: (Type -> Type) -> k -> Type) where
  • hoist :: forall m n (b :: k). Monad m => (forall a. m a -> n a) -> t m b -> t n b
name: MFunctor hoist

display_html:
class (MFunctor t, MonadTrans t) => MMonad (t :: (Type -> Type) -> Type -> Type) where
  • embed :: forall (n :: Type -> Type) m b. Monad n => (forall a. m a -> t n a) -> t m b -> t n b
name: MMonad embed

display_html: class Foldable (t :: Type -> Type)
name: Foldable

display_html: distribute :: (Monad m, MonadTrans t, MFunctor t, Monad (t m), Monad (t (Proxy a' a b' b m))) => Proxy a' a b' b (t m) r -> t (Proxy a' a b' b m) r
name: distribute

name: liftCatchError
